TopicTitle: Kerbalkon: Live event or live stream?

Articles.Content:
I cannot seem to find clarification sifting thru the forums, so i will straight-up ask:

Will the 2013 Kerbalkon be a live event that one can travel to and attend or will it only be a live stream?

I go to a lot of game conferences with my kids and grandkids and since we are all Kerbalites, we would like to see if we can attend...

Thanks in advance !
I am pretty sure it is just a stream since that was the case with every previous ones.
Probably just a stream there was a kerbalcon website that said 17 days and didn't mention a location

Probably just a stream there was a kerbalcon website that said 17 days and didn't mention a location

yeah, i saw the same site and have bookmarked it and set an outlook reminder so i can keep checking on it...

Im hoping a mod will see this thread and clarify...
